hero.title: Premium Song Names
text: Start generating song names from the largest database of available song names that has been ever created.
Generate over 2,842,000 unique song names to delight your future fans and catch the attention of producers all around the world.

description_section.title: Become musically famous
description_section.text: Become the next family to disrupt the music industry by generating entire albums together. You can even save the best ones for later and continue generating until you find just the right one.

premium_section.title: Handcrafted Song Names
premium_section.text: Are you in need of handcrafter premium song names? Say no more pal! With song Generator Plus for only 4.99$ you will get 6 handcrafted song names directly to your mailbox.
